participant_1.background:
I live in a small town in the Midwest, USA.
I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.
My daily routine consists of applying for jobs and working on my own stories in the hopes that one day I'll be published.

participant_2.background:
My first organic purchase was a locally grown banana for my girlfriend.
My most valuable thing is my memory of seeing Ween live in concert.
i am from russia.
i started at google on an internship.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

content.text: Not much, just got off work. What about you?
I'm just hanging out, working on my own stories.
Oh, cool! What kind of stories do you write?
I write a lot of fantasy, but I also write some science fiction and horror.
That sounds really cool! I love to read fantasy.
I'm glad to hear that! Do you have a favorite fantasy book?
I love the Lord of the Rings books!
Those are great! I'm actually a huge fan of the movies too.
Me too! I've seen them all so many times.
What's your favorite part of the movies?
I love the battle scenes, but I also love the character development.
I agree, the character development is really well done.
It's so interesting to see how the characters change and grow over the course of the story.
It's definitely one of the things that makes the movies so great.
